She is grateful for the support and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Yanet Luisa

texts.es:
La socia Yanet pertenece al banco comunal Santo Domingo, la socia continua dedicandose a trabajar en un salon de belleza realizando diferentes tipos de cortes y teñidos de cabello para sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su trabajo,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para comprar tintes,tijeras entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner, Yanet, belongs to the communal bank Santo Domingo. The partner continues dedicating herself to work in a beauty salon, creating different types of haircuts and dyes for hair that her clients request. She has spent a good amount of time in this work, which has gone well for her thanks to the effort she puts in to her work every day. In this way she helps move her family forward.

The partner requests a loan to buy hair dyes and scissors, among other things. She feels grateful for the loan and promises to complete the established payment quotas.

loans.use: to buy hair dye and scissors, among other things.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella tiene 32 años de edad es madre y padre para sus dos hijos, ella tiene un carro que lo da en alquiler a las persona que brindar servicio de trasporte. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. Karina es una mujer emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Yanapakuy”.
texts.en: Karina was born in Cusco and continues to live in the same city.  She is 32 years old and must be mother and father to her two children.  She has a car that she rents out to people who provide transportation services.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to do maintenance on her car.  She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.  Karina is an enterprising and responsible woman who continues to be a member of the “Yanapakuy” communal bank.

loans.use: to maintain her vehicle.

loans.name: Oscar Douglas

texts.es:
El señor Oscar, tiene 47 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos en su casa de habitación en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, se dedican desde hace 14 años a la venta de plásticos como ser basureros, trapeadores, canastas, baldes, barriles,  maceteros etc. El sale a vender a comunidades fuera de San Lorenzo y también su esposa vende en  su casa.
Don Oscar está solicitando  el préstamo para compra de trapeadores, canastas, baldes, barriles, maceteros, pailas, cucharones, bolsas, platos, vasos, tortilleras plásticas, etc. Para así tener variedad de productos y poder satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes que a diario le visitan.
Don Oscar espera obtener buenas ganancias que le permiten mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia, su sueño ampliar su negocio y fortalecerlo. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Oscar is 47 years old and lives with his wife and two children in his home in San Lorenzo; southern Honduras.  They have been selling plastic products such as trash cans, mops, baskets, pails, barrels, planters, etc. for 14 years.  He travels to communities outside of San Lorenzo to sell, and his wife sells from their home.

Oscar is asking for this loan to buy mops, baskets, pails, barrels, planters, spoons, bags, plates, cups, plastic tortilla holders, etc.  In this way he will have a variety of products to satisfy demand from his customers who visit him daily.

Oscar expects to have a good income that will allow him to improve his and his family’s quality of life a bit.  His dream is to expand and strengthen his business.

loans.use: to buy plastic items.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La socia Maria Elena pertenece al Banco comunal “Santo Domingo”.La socia continua con su negocio de restaurante, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia ,la socia ,la socia ofrece lo que son cenas,desayunos y almuerzos,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz,aceite,menestras entre otros para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner, Maria Elena, belongs to the communal bank "Santo Domingo". She is continuing with her restaurant business, which she has spent years working on and is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. The partner offers dinners, breakfasts, and lunches. She is a responsable and diligent person. In this manner she has moved her family forward.

She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients for her business like rice, oil, and stews among others.

She feels grateful for the loan she has been granted and promises to complete the established payment quotas.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business like rice, oil, and stews among others.

loans.name: Jose Alfonso

texts.es: José nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 40 años de edad es casado fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, él se dedica a brindar servicio de trasporte. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. El socio es una persona emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Yanapakuy”.
texts.en: Jose was born in Cusco and he lives in the same city where he was born. He is 40 and married, and as a result of this wonderful relationship, he has three children. He works providing transportation services. On this occasion, he needs a loan to do car maintenance. He is happy for the loan and promises to make his payments. He is an enterprising and responsible person who belongs to the Yanapakuy communal bank.

loans.use: to do car maintenance.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia Celia sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO” y las reuniones del banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento del Cusco.

La socia Celia sigue dedicandose a brindar el servicio de movilidad escolar, a la vez la socia sigue dedicandose  a la venta de ropa de segundo uso ,la socia vende en las ferias de los dias sabados durante el dia,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para el cambio de aceite a su carro.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Celia still belongs to the Santo Domingo communal bank. The bank's meetings take place in the Cusco district, in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco. Celia still works transporting children to and from school. She also still works selling second-hand clothing. She sells at festivals on Saturdays during the day. She has been in this business for years, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day, this being the way that she advances her family. She is applying for the loan to change the oil in her car. She is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to change the oil in her car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase drinking buckets, kitchen baskets, plastic bowls and sets of pans to sell

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 42 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, él se dedica a comprar y venta de madera. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. El socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. El socio es una persona emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Yanapakuy”.
texts.en: Carlos was born in Cusco and lives in the same city.  He is 42 years old, lives with his wife, and they have three children.  Carlos buys and sells lumber.  On this occasion he needs a loan to buy lumber.  He is happy about this loan and is committed to making his payments on time because he is an enterprising and responsible person who continues to me a member of the “Yanapakuy” communal bank.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Juana Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia Juana Elizabeth sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO” y las reuniones del banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento del Cusco.

La socia Juana Elizabeth continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de accesorios para carros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de accesorios como parabrisas y aceites para su negocio.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana Elizabeth continues to be a member of the “SANTO DOMINGO” communal bank, located in the Cusco district, province, and department.

Juana Elizabeth continues to sell auto parts and has been doing this for some time.  Things are going well for her business, thanks to the daily effort she puts in.  She is a responsible, dedicated woman who gets her family ahead in this way.

She is asking for this loan to buy parts such as windshields and lubricants.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy auto parts.

loans.name: Luis Aberto

texts.es: Luis  nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 37 años de edad, es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, él se dedica a distribución equipos de dentales. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales dentales como amalgama, resinas y otras cosas. El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. El socio es una persona emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Yanapakuy”.
texts.en: Luis was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the same city where he was born. He is 37 years old and married, and as the fruit of this beautiful relationship he has two children. On this occasion, he needs the loan to buy dental materials such as amalgam, resins and other items. He is happy about the loan and is committed to making his payments. The borrower is an enterprising and responsible person who continues to belong to the “Yanapakuy” communal bank.

loans.use: to buy dental supplies such as amalgam, resins and other items.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             
La socia es la Sra. Augusta ella es casada y tiene 54 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de vidrios, la socia vende desde las 8.00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 22 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta salir a pasear con sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de vidrios. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar vidrios al por mayor.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de desayunos, negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de artesanías y negocio de venta de internet.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo despues la foto porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.

 La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These ladies are members of the “NUEVO AMANECER” communal bank, located in the Cusco district, province and department.

Augusta is 54 years old, married and has four children.  She sells glass, works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm, and has been doing this for 22 years.  Things are going well for her and she likes to fish with her children in her spare time.  Her goal is to expand her business and is asking for this loan to buy glass in quantity.

The other members sell breakfasts, groceries, arts and crafts, and internet services.  [Augusta’s] picture is added to the group photo because she had to work when the photo was taken.

She is grateful to those who form part of this dream through this means and she is committed to making her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy glass.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La socia Marcelina sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO” y las reuniones del banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento del Cusco.

La socia Marcelina continua con su negocio de cafetín,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia ofrece postres,tortas,cafes,gelatinas entre otros,la socia trabaja desde las 07:00am hasta las 10:00pm,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de gaseosas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Marcelina continues to be a member of the “SANTO DOMINGO” communal bank and they meet in Cusco district, province, and department.

Marcelina still has her café.  She has had it for many years and things have gone well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into her business each day.  She sells desserts, sandwiches, coffee, and gelatins among other things.  She works from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm each day and is a responsible dedicated woman who gets her family ahead in this way.

She will use the money from this loan to buy soft drinks for her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
This is 28-year-old Joseph.  He is married and has no children.  In 2009, Joseph established his provisions (Ovaltine, toothpaste, soap, cigarettes, soft drinks, etc.) business. He began his business because he attended school up to senior secondary level, but he has no sponsorship to further to tertiary level.  

He joined what we called the Osusu Scheme and when he received his own share, he bought a motorbike which he used as public transport.  The income he generated was used to establish his provisions shop.  Working 7 days a week and 15 hours a day, he earns about 2,760,000 SLL every month from this business.

He would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL. Joseph  has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy hard drinks, soft drinks and pure water. In the future, Joseph plans to open another outlet, build a house and become an international business man.  This loan will help to maximize his profit. He is a hardworking business man.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy hard drinks, soft drinks and pure water

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia tiene 28 años de edad y tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal es trabajar en un condominio donde lava, concina, plancha entre otras cosas más pero también tiene un mototaxi que a su esposo le sirve para brindar servicio de transportes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del mototaxi. Ella  está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en: Sonia is 28 years old and has two children. She works in a condominium where she performs activities like cleaning, washing, cooking and other services, but she also has a mototaxi that her husband uses to provide transportation services. She is requesting the loan to perform maintenance on the vehicle. She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her mototaxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plastic shoes - 25 dozen @  SLL 72,000, sandals for ladies - 6 dozens @ SLL 180,000, comfort slippers - 30 pieces @ SLL 4,000 for sale in her plastic shoe business.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es: María Josefa tiene 19 años de edad y vive en la provincia de Urubamba, ella es conviviente y fruto de esta relación tiene un hijo, ella  está al cuidado de su hijo pero su esposo trabaja en un hotel como cheff entonces la socia quiere vender artesanía de forma ambulatoria en la puerta del hotel. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería  como tejidos y cerámica.  Ella  está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. Ella es una persona emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja”.
texts.en: María Josefa is 19 years old and lives in the providence of Urubamba. She lives with a partner and has a son from this relationship. She is caring for her son, but her husband works in a hotel as a chef, so she wants to sell artesanry by the hotel door. For this opportunity, she requires the loan to purchase merchandise like fabrics and ceramics. She is happy with the loan and promises to complete the payments. She is an ambitious and responsible person who continues to belong to the communal bank "Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja"..

loans.use: to buy merchandise like fabrics and ceramics.

loans.name: Martha Yuli

texts.es: Martha Yuli tiene 26 años de edad y vive en la provincia de Urubamba, ella es soltera y aun no tiene hijos, ella  se dedica a la venta de productos como papas, choclo y otros pero también se dedica a la elaboración de chicha de jora. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz para elaborar jora para luego hacer chicha de jora. Ella  está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. Ella es una persona emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja”.
texts.en: Martha Yuli is 26 years old and she lives in the province of Urubamba.  She is single and does not have any children.  She sells produce such as potatoes, corn, and others, but she also makes chicha from jora, a kind of specially-prepared corn.  Currently, she needs a loan to buy corn to make jora, which she will then make into chicha.  She is happy with her loan and she promises to make her payments.  She is an enterprising and responsible person who is still a member of the Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja Communal Bank.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es: Guillermina tiene 62 años de edad y vive en la provincia de Urubamba, ella es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene siete hijos, ella  se dedica a la venta y compra de verduras como cebollas, zanahorias, lechugas, repollo entre otras. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como cebollas, papas, zanahorias entre otras más. Ella  está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. Ella es una persona emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja”.
texts.en: Guillermina is 62 years old and lives in the Urubamba province.  She is married and has seven children.  She buys and sells vegetables such as onions, carrots, lettuce, cabbage, and other things.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy merchandise.  She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.  She is an enterprising and responsible person who continues to be a member of the “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” communal bank.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Zacharia

texts.en:
This is 36-year-old Zacharia.  He is married, and has 3 children aged 12, 8 and 3 years and all are school going children. He has 1 additional dependent, who lives with him because he is helping in the house.  In 2008, Zacharia established his motorbikes business. He began his business because he dropped out of school due to lack of interest.  He joined his elder brother in business.  After some years his brother gave him some money to start selling cosmetics.  He later changed to electronics and motorbikes. Working 5 days a week and 13 hours a day, he earns about SLL 2,580,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. Zacharia requires a loan in order to buy a motorbike - 1 piece @ SLL 4,000,000, and inner tires/2 pieces @ SLL 500,000. 

In the future, Zacharia plans to build another house, educate his children and send them abroad, and become an international business man.  This loan will help to increase his profit. Custom fees are very high. He is a hardworking and honest business man  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike - 1 piece @ SLL 4,000,000, and inner tires 2 pieces @ SLL 500,000

loans.name: Señor De Los Milagros Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Señor de los Milagros” que conforman 09 mujeres emprendedoras a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 13. Elisa tiene 52 años, divorciada. Cuenta con una bodega la cual ofrece productos de primera necesidad lleva trabajando de esta manera hace más de 15 años. En las noches vende papa rellena a pedido. Seguir mejorando su negocio es su mayor deseo. Su último crédito lo destinará como capital de trabajo, la cual comprara arroz, azúcar, leche, bebidas y papa. Elisa está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Kiva. Elisa se encuentra ubicada en la parte de atrás es la primera del lado derecho, viste polo rosado.
texts.en:
The Señor de los Milagros group is made up of nine enterprising women who work doing different commercial activities.  They are in their 13th loan cycle.  

Elisa is 52 years old and divorced.  She has a convenience store where she offers basic products.  She has been working in this manner for more than fifteen years.  At night, she sells stuffed potatoes made to order.  Her greatest wish is to continue improving her business.  She will use this loan as working capital, which will purchase rice, sugar, milk, drinks, and potatoes.  She is very happy with this loan and thankful to Kiva.  

Elisa is the first on the right in the back dressed in a pink shirt.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, drinks, and potatoes.

loans.name: Luzvenia

texts.es: Lusvenia es cocinera pero también se dedica a la venta de abarrotes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y entre otras cosas. Ella  está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos. Ella es una persona emprendedora y responsable que sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja”.
texts.en: Lusvenia is a cook, but she also works selling groceries. On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy merchandise, such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar and other items. She is happy about the loan and committed to making her payments. She is an enterprising and responsible person who continues to belong to the communal bank "Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” ["The Sunflowers of Rumichaca Baja"].

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar and other items.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
Soledad continua con la agricultura y a la crianza de animales como pollos, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlo a sus clientes que le solicitan. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Solicita el préstamo para la compra pollos. 
Soledad se siente agradecida por el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Soledad still works in farming and raising livestock, such as chickens.  She raises these little animals to later sell them to the customers who request them.  She has been in this business for several years now and it is going well for her.  She is asking for this loan to buy chickens.

Soledad is thankful for the loan she has been granted and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los arenales, aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar vive La señora Rosa, tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 14 años que estudian en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella y su esposo tienen un negocio de venta de mariscos en su casa, día a día ella en las madrugadas se va hasta las playas de Los Arenales donde llegan los pescadores con sus productos y allí  compra los mariscos para luego limpiarlos y venderlos en su local, trabajan todos los días desde hace 15 años y siempre les ha ido muy bien aunque hay temporadas en que el negocio baja un poco pero luego vuelve a subir y les quedan buenos ingresos.
  
Este crédito es para comprar pescado, camarón, langostinos, entre otras muchas variedades de mariscos. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito. 
 
Su sueño es seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
In the parish of Crucita in the canton of Portiviejo, there is a place known as Los Arenales  This is where the members of the Nueva Generación Communal Bank meet every 15 days.  The area is known for its beautiful beaches, its gastronomy, and the warmth of its people. 

This is where Rosa lives.  She is 41, married, and has two children who are 17 and 14 years old and who are in school.  Her husband is a businessman.

She and her husband have a business selling seafood in their home.  Every day at dawn she goes to the beaches of Los Arenales where the fishermen arrive with their catches and that is where she buys her seafood, which she later cleans and sells in her shop.  They have worked every day for 15 years and it has always gone well for them, and though there have been times when the business dips a little, it always rebounds and they make good profits.

This loan is to buy fish, shrimp, and prawns, among many other varieties of seafood.  She is the founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because the interest rates are lower than other lenders.
  
Her dream is to keep growing her business.

loans.use: to buy fish, shrimp, prawns, etc.

loans.name: Visitasion

texts.es: La socia continúa con el negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y pollos y con la venta de chicha (bebida a base de maiz) y venta de verduras como tomates, zanahorias, lechugas y cebollas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar abono y semillas. La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This communal bank member still has her business raising animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens, and she is also still selling chicha (a corn-based drink), and vegetables, such as tomatoes, carrots, lettuce, and onions.  She is asking for this loan to buy fertilizer and seeds.  She is happy with the loan and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora continua con la agricultura, a la preparación de chicha de jora, a la crianza de animales menores y en otras oportunidades ayuda a otras personas en sus chacras. En esta oportunidad Teodora requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para los animales como pasto. Teodora es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Teodora is continuing with agriculture, the preparation of chicha de jora [a corn-based beverage], and raising small animals, as well as sometimes helping other people on their farms. At this time, Teodora needs the loan to buy feed for her animals, such as grass. Teodora is a member of the group “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” ["The Sunflowers of Rumichaca Baja"] made up of 19 members who live in the village of Rumichaca Baja, which is also where they carry out their economic activities.

loans.use: to buy feed, such as grass, for her animals.

loans.name: Margarita Isabel

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los arenales, aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

Aquí vive la señora Margarita, tiene 56 años de edad, es soltera y  vive con su mamá y su hermana. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el inicio aunque luego se retiró pero regreso porque los créditos son de gran ayuda en su negocio.

Doña Margarita lleva más 30 años administrando un bar en una escuela de su localidad, en el vende todo tipo de productos preparados por ella, solo vende comida saludable como corviches, empanadas, arroz con pollo y ensalada de frutas, ella trata de no repetir sus productos en la semana para darle más variedad para que los niños estén contentos, próximamente espera comprar lo necesario para poder vender almuerzos para los profesores que tienen que quedarse hasta más tarde.

Este crédito es para comprar loas víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos y frutas para los jugos.

Su sueño es seguir dando lo mejor a los niños.
texts.en:
In the parish of Crucita in the canton of Portoviejo, there is a place known as "the Sands."  This is where the members of the Nueva Generación Communal Bank meet every fifteen days.  The area is known for its beautiful beaches, its gastronomy, and for the warmth of its people.

It is here that 56-year-old Margarita lives.  She is single and she lives with her mom and her sister.  She was with the communal bank in the beginning, though she left and then came back because the loans are a great help to her business.

For over 30 years, Margarita has been managing a canteen at a local school where she sells all kinds of things that she prepares herself.  She only sells healthy food, like corviche, empanadas, chicken and rice, and fruit salad.  She tries not to repeat her dishes during the week so that there is more variety and the kids are satisfied.  Soon, she hopes to buy what she needs to sell lunches to the teachers who have to stay late.

This loan is to buy foodstuffs she needs to make meals and fruit for juices.  

Her dream is to keep giving the children the best.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs and fruits

loans.name: Luisa Yasmina

texts.es: Luisa de 39 años de edad, vive junto a su hija de 7 años de edad, en casa alquilada, a pesar que no vive junto a su esposo, él le brinda ayuda económica para sostener a su hija. Luisa se dedica a la elaboración de pan dulce como: tortas, magdalenas y otros más, ella se dedica a elaborar el pan desde hace 3 años atrás con lo que ha podido salir adelante. Luisa comercializa sus productos en un mercado de su lugar de habitación donde posee muchos clientes fijos quienes cada tarde gustan de una porción de pan acompañado de una taza de café.   Luisa solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con los recursos necesarios para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, polvo de hornear, moldes y otros más con los cuales pueda realizar mayor cantidad de  pan y así mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en: Luisa is 39 years old and lives with her 7-year-old daughter in a rented house. Though her husband doesn't live with them, he sends money to provide for their daughter. Luisa has made a living baking sweet breads like cakes, muffins and other items for the past three years. She sells her products at a market near her home, where she has many regular customers who every afternoon like a piece of bread and a cup of coffee. She is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Apoyo Integral so she can purchase necessary ingredients like flour, lard, baking powder, molds and other items so she can bake a larger amount of bread and thus increase her sales.

loans.use: to purchase flour, lard, baking powder and other items.

loans.name: Marcosa

texts.es: Marcosa continua con la agricultura, con la preparación de chicha de jora y con la crianza de animales menores. Marcosa es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. En esta oportunidad Marcosa requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz para preparar jora y también para comprar cerveza. Marcosa es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Marcosa is continuing with agriculture, preparing chicha de jora [a corn drink] and raising small animals. Marcosa is an enterprising and hard-working woman who is helping her family get ahead. On this occasion, Marcosa needs the loan to buy corn to prepare jora and also to buy beer. Marcosa is a member of the group “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” ["The Sunflowers of Rumichaca Baja"] which is made up of members who live in the village of Rumichaca Baja and also carry out their economic activities there.

loans.use: to buy corn to prepare jora and also to buy beer.

loans.name: Yony

texts.es: Yony continua con la agricultura y con la crianza de animales menores pero su actividad económica principal es trabajar en un hotel como cocinera. En esta oportunidad Yony requiere el préstamo para hacer construir su casa y desea comprar yeso, cemento, madera, arena, tubos y focos. Su sueño de Yony es la abrir un restaurante en la ciudad de Urubamba. Yony es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Yony continues with her farm work and raising small animals, but her main source of income comes from working in a hotel as a cook. She is requesting the loan to build her home, and she wants to purchase plaster, cement, wood, sand, pipes and light bulbs. Her dream is to open a restaurant in the city of Urubamba. Yony is a member of "Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja" community bank, which consists of members who work and live in the village of Rumichaca Baja.

loans.use: to purchase plaster, cement, wood, sand, pipes and light bulbs.

loans.name: Jesus Salvador

texts.es: Jesús de 40 años de edad, es una persona muy alegre quien a pesar de realizar un trabajo muy duro, es feliz ya que de este modo sostiene a su familia, la cual está conformada por su esposa y una pequeña hija de 8 años de edad. Jesús trabaja comercializando cocos, los cuales parte y saca el agua para colocarla en una bolsa y así vendérsela a sus clientes, el agua de coco es un negocio bastante estable, sobretodo porque él se encuentra en calle principal donde muchas personas transitan y lo visualizan. Jesús solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de cocos, así también bolsitas plásticas para colocar el agua de los cocos, pajillas y cucharas, con lo que pueda tener su negocio muy bien equipado.
texts.en: Forty-year-old Jesús is a very upbeat person who, though he does hard work, is happy because it allows him to support his family.  His family is made up of his wife and his young, eight-year-old daughter.  Jesús sells coconuts, splitting them to extract the water, which he puts in bags to sell to his customers.  Coconut water is a pretty stable business, mostly because he is located on a main street where many people pass by and see him.  Jesús is asking INTEGRAL for a loan so he can have the money he needs to buy a greater quantity of coconuts, as well as plastic bags for the coconut water, straws, and spoons.  This will allow him to have his business well stocked.

loans.use: to buy coconuts to sell

loans.name: Ida Esperanza

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los arenales, aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar vive la señora Ida, tiene 50 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos mayores de edad pero uno de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo se dedica al comercio. 

Doña Ida para obtener sus propios recursos y con estos solventar los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de mariscos en su casa, tiene un pequeño bien surtido donde sus clientes encuentran del todo ya que ella les ofrece: camarón, langostinos, cangrejos, pescado en muchas variedades, conchas, entre otras cosas y todas de muy buena calidad ya que esta es su garantía y es por esto que sus clientes la prefieren. Lleva más de  20 años  con su negocio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar toda clase de mariscos. Está en el en el Banco Comunal casi desde el inicio y le gusta porque sus compañeras son unidas y confiables. 

Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que en la que vive es de sus padres.
texts.en:
In the parish of Crucita in the canton of Portoviejo, there is a place call Los Arenales.  This is where the members of the Nueva Generación Communal Bank meet every 15 days.  The area is known for its beautiful beaches, its gastronomy, and the warmth of its people.

This is where Ida lives.  She is 50 years old, married, and has two children who are now adults, though one still lives with her.  Her husband is a businessman.

Sra. Ida sells seafood in her home in order to make enough to cover the household expenses.  She has a small, well-stocked stand where her customers can find whatever they want, as she has shrimp, prawns, crabs, many kinds of fish, and conches, among others.  She guarantees that everything is of very good quality, which is why her customers prefer her.  She has had her business for over 20 years and it is doing well.

This loan is to buy all kinds of seafood.  She has been with the communal bank almost from the beginning and she likes it because her fellow members are close-knit and trustworthy.  

Her dream is to have her own home, as she lives with her parents.

loans.use: to buy seafood

loans.name: Giovanni Alexander

texts.es: Giovanni de 19 años de edad, vive junto a su madre quien trabaja como cosmetóloga y junta a una hermana menor que se dedica a estudiar. Giovanni es trabajador y responsable quien desea ayudar a su madre con los gastos del hogar, por lo que con mucho sacrificio puso su propio taller de estructuras metálicas hace dos años atrás. Debido a la falta de dinero para invertir en más hierro, él se ha visto obligado a no aceptar todo el trabajo que le solicitan, lo que ya no desea que siga ocurriendo, por esto Giovanni solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda invertir en la compra de hierro por mayoreo, herramientas y otros más para seguir realizando su trabajo de la mejor manera. Giovanni está lleno de muchos sueños los cuales poco a poco con la mejora de su negocio podrá ir realizando.
texts.en:
Giovanni is 19 years old and lives with his mother, who works as a beautician, and his younger sister, who is in school.  

Giovanni is hard-working and responsible and wants to help his mother out with the household expenses. This is why he worked hard to start his own metal shop two years ago. Due to not having enough money to invest in iron, he has not been able to accept all of the jobs that have been offered to him. He does not want this situation to continue, and that is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which he will invest in the purchase of iron in bulk, tools, and other items necessary for him to improve the way in which he works. 

Giovanni has many dreams which he will be able to realize, little by little, as long as his business keeps growing.

loans.use: to buy iron to make metal structures to sell.

loans.name: Issa

texts.en:
Issa is 51 years old, married, and has four children.  In 1986, he established his assorted shoes business. He began his business because he did not attend English school.  He only leaned Arabic and he used to assist his elder sister with her business.  After acquiring experience, his friend gave him a loan to start his own business, which has now grown from peddler to stall.  Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about 1,575,000 SLL every month.

Issa is requesting his second loan for 4,000,000 SLL, which he will use to buy crepe and shoes. In the future, Issa plans to complete his house, send his son abroad, open another outlet, and buy a car.  This loan will help to improve the business. He is hardworking business man.

loans.use: to purchase crepe and shoes.

loans.name: Ana Eleticia

texts.es: Ana de 62 años de edad, es una persona quien lucha por salir adelante y tener una vida estable, ella vive junto a su esposo de 79 años de edad, quien le ayuda con el negocio. Ana posee una  una tienda de productos perecederos y de primera necesidad, la cual les permite contar con una vida estable, contando con la ventaja que está ubicada en su casa de habitación, la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha ido surtiendo para sacarle el mayor provecho posible al negocio. Ana solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar: leche, golosinas, pan, granos básicos, sodas, jugos, huevos y otros productos más con lo que pueda asegurarse una mejor clientela y de este modo mejorar su negocio, lo cual es muy vital para Ana y su esposo ya que ambos son de edad avanzada y no poseen otros ingresos extras.
texts.en: Ana is 62 years old and is a person who works hard to get ahead and have a stable life.  She lives with her 79 year old husband who helps her with her business.  Ana has a perishable items store in her home.  This allows her to have a stable life, with the advantage of being in her home and that she has managed to stock with some effort to get the most possible out of it.  Ana is asking for this loan through INTEGRAL so that she can buy milk, snacks, bread, basic grains, sodas, juices, eggs, and other products.  This will make it possible for her to have better customers and allow her to improve her business; it’s vital for Ana and her husband because they are both of advanced age and don’t have extra income.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Osveida

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los arenales, aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar vive la señora Osveida,  tiene 66 años  de edad, es madre soltera de 12  hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, con ella aun viven tres de sus hijos los cuales aun están solteros.

Doña Osveida para ganarse la vida y con esto sacar adelante a sus hijos después de la pérdida de su esposo hace varios años, se dedico al comercio, ella como pudo instalo un pequeño bar en su casa para aprovechar que hasta esta localidad llegan muchos turistas y con esto puede salir adelante dignamente, en su local vende empanadas, corviches, gaseosas, jugos y otras bebidas, además los fines de semana prepara y vende el delicioso ceviche de pescado el cual es muy apetecido por los turistas que llegan hasta el lugar. Trabaja de miércoles a domingo desde las 8h00 hasta las 15h00, lleva más de 15 años con su negocio y gracias a Dios le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar aceite, plátano, maní y otros víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Es fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta por los beneficios que les ofrece el banco.
 
Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
The members of “Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación” meet every two weeks in the Crucita parish of the Portoviejo settlement.  This area is known for its beautiful beaches, food, and the warmth of its people.

Osveida lives here.  She is 66 years old and the single mother of 12 adult children.  Three of her children, still single, live with her.
 
Osveida is a merchant and set up a small pub in her home, so that she could get her children ahead after the loss of her husband.  She wanted to take advantage of the fact that many tourists arrive here and in this way she can get ahead in a dignified way.  She sells empanadas, corviches, soft drinks, juices, and other drinks.  Also on the weekends she prepares a delicious ceviche which the tourists really enjoy.  She works Wednesday through Sunday from 8:00 am to 3:00 pm and has been doing this for more than 15 years.  Thanks to God, things are going very well for her business.

She will use the money from this loan to buy cooking oil, plantains, corn, and other foods to prepare her dishes.  She is a founding member of the communal bank and likes the benefits it offers.

Her dream is to have a grand restaurant.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Alex Ricardo

texts.es: Alex de 32 años de edad, se dedica a la comercialización de frutas y verduras, trabajo que realiza junto a su esposa con quien trabajan muy duro para dar lo mejor de sí y vivir mejor con su pequeña hija de 3 años de edad. Alex es muy trabajador y responsable con su familia, él comercializa la fruta de forma ambulante en diferentes colonias incluso pueblos, productos que anuncia por un megáfono para que las personas sean persuadidas a salir de sus casas a comprar las verduras y frutas frescas que llegan hasta la puerta de su hogar. Alex solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de variedad de frutas y verduras por mayor para obtenerla a mejores precios y así vender un poco más barato que su competencia, pudiendo aumentar sus ventas notoriamente, lo cual le permita vivir mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Alex is 32 years old and sells fruits and vegetables.  He works hard alongside his wife, to give it his all and be able to live better with his three year old daughter.  Alex is a hard worker and responsible for his family.  He sells fruit on foot in different neighborhoods and towns.  He advertises his products via megaphone so that people will be persuaded to come out of their homes to buy fresh fruits and vegetables that arrive at their doors.

Alex is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so that he can invest in a variety of fruits and vegetables in quantity so that he can get them at better prices and be able to sell a little cheaper than his competition.  This will increase his sales and will allow him and his family to live better.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los arenales, aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Generación, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.

En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 56 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija de 26 años que está casada y vive en  su casa  con toda su familia. Su marido es agricultor.

Doña Rosa es una muy  buena mujer la cual junto con su esposo se dedican a la agricultura, siembran cultivos de ciclo corto como melón, arroz, maíz y pimiento. Además también se dedica  a la cría de pollos para lo cual tiene una pequeña granja, en estas fechas vende muchos pollos y a muy buen precio. Trabajan en estas actividades de lunes a viernes desde las 07h00 hasta las 16h00, con ellos trabajan dos personas a los que les pagan un sueldo semanal. Su producción agrícola la venden a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa y de igual forma sucede con los pollos, los mismos que también venden por libras a sus vecinos.

Este nuevo crédito es para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes ya que se acerca la época del invierno ye es cuando más siembran, además de alimentos para pollos.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante y gozar de  buena salud ella y su familia.
texts.en:
In the Crucita parish in the Portoviejo canton there is a place known as Los Arenales.  Every fifteen days the members of the Nueva Generación community bank meet there.  It is known for its beautiful beaches, its cuisine, and the warmth of its people.

Rosa is 56 years old and lives in a common law marriage.  She has a 26 year old daughter who is married and lives in her home with all of her family.  Her husband is a farmer.  

Rosa is a good woman who works with her husband as a farmer.  They cultivate short cycle crops such as melon, rice, corn, and peppers.  She also works raising chickens, which she has a small farm to do.  At this time of year, she sells many chickens at a good price.  They work from Monday to Friday from 7:00am until 4:00pm.  They work with two people who are paid a weekly salary.  They sell their harvest to merchants to come to their home and do the same with the chickens.  They also sell by the pound to their neighbors.  

She will use this loan to purchase seeds, agricultural supplies, and fertilizer since they are getting close to the winter when they do the most planting.  She will also purchase chicken feed.

Her dreams are to succeed and that she and her family enjoy good health.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, agricultural supplies, fertilizer, and chicken feed.

loans.name: Byron Antolin

texts.es: Byron de 27 años de edad, es un joven comerciantes con grandes deseo de salir adelante y ser mejor día con día, él vive junto a su hermana con quien trabajan muy duro para contar con todo lo necesario. Byron posee un negocio de venta de ropa para hombres y mujeres, el cual está ubicado sobre calle principal, en un lugar de mucho comercio y al mismo tiempo de mucha competencia. Byron desea hacer crecer su negocio, brindar mejores precios y de este modo contar con más ganancias, razón principal por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda surtir el negocio adquiriendo camisas en diferentes colores y estilos, pantalones, pants, delantales y otros más con lo que pueda incrementar sus clientes logrando vender más.
texts.en: Byron is 27 years old and is a young merchant with a great desire to get ahead and be better each day.  He lives with his sister with whom he works hard to get all that is necessary.  Byron has a men’s and women’s clothing business located on a main street.  There are many businesses here and at the same time lots of competition.  Byron wants to grow his business and provide better prices.  In this way he can increase his profits.  This is why he requested a loan through INTEGRAL, so he can stock his store with shirts of different colors and styles, pants, aprons, and other things so he can increase his customer base and sell more.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Transito

texts.es: Transito de 70 años de edad, es una señora muy responsable y trabajadora, quien vive junto a su esposo y una hija en casa propia. Transito  posee un puesto de frutas y verduras en el mercado municipal de su lugar de vivienda, en el cual vende su producto por unidad y al mayoreo, ella cuenta con muchos clientes sobre todo  las personas que poseen comedores en el mismo mercado las cuales compran ahí debido a que Transito vende las verduras a muy buenos precios. Es por esto que solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de frutas y verduras, ya que ella quiere comprar al por mayor para poder comprar a precios menores y vender aún más barato. Esto es de mucha importancia para ella ya que le permite percibir mayores ganancias lo cual beneficia a su hogar.
texts.en:
Transito, 70 years old, is a responsible and hardworking woman who lives with her husband and her daughter in their own house. Transito has a produce stand in a local municipal market. She sells her fruits and vegetables both wholesale and in small quantities. Transito serves many customers, primarily, the people who own food stalls within the same market. These customers patronize her business because she offers her produce at very good prices.

Transito is requesting this loan in order to buy larger quantities of fruits and vegetables, so she will be able to offer them at even more competitive prices. This will help her increase her profits, which will help her to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es: Aydee continúa con el trabajo en uno de los restaurantes más lujosos de la ciudad de Urubamba. Ya son cuatro años que trabaja en el restaurante y le va muy bien. Aydee continúa con la  crianza de animales menores como cuyes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes.    Aydee es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Aydee is still working at one of the most opulent restaurants in the city of Urubamba.  She has been working at the restaurant for four years now and it is going very well for her.  Aydee is still raising small livestock, such as guinea pigs.  Currently, she needs a loan to buy guinea pigs.  Aydee is a member of the Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja Group, which is made up of members who live and work in the town of Rumichaca Baja.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs

loans.name: Reina

texts.es: Reyna de 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y un hijo que se dedica a trabajar. Reina posee una venta de frutas y verduras, la cual está ubicada en un  mercado muy grande que cuenta con la visita de muchas personas diariamente,  ella cuenta con poca competencia en el lugar y varios clientes fijos, lo que es una gran ventaja.  Reina solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar frutas y verduras por mayor, de manera que las pueda obtener a precios más bajos, así mismo utilizará este préstamo para construir una habitación extra en su casa de habitación en la que construirá una pila grande para guardar agua ya que en su lugar de habitación el agua escasea mucho. Reina es una mujer responsable y trabajadora quien se dedica de lleno a su trabajo y cuenta con un gran compromiso el cual es brindar los mejores productos.
texts.en: Reyna is 56 years old and lives with her husband and son who works.  She has a fruit and vegetable business located in a large market visited by many people each day.  She has little competition and several steady customers, which is a great advantage for her.  Reina is asking for a loan so that she can buy fruits and vegetables in quantity so that she can get them for lower prices.  She will also use some of the money to build another room onto her house where she will install a large water tank because water gets scarce where she lives.  Reina is a very responsible and hardworking woman who gives her all to her work and has a commitment to provide the best products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and add a water tank.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: María de 50 años de edad, vive junto a su hija y una pequeña nieta. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos como crema, queso y requesón, su venta está ubicada en el mercado municipal del lugar en que reside, en donde posee varios clientes los cuales le compran semanal sus productos. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar más productos lácteos como requesón, crema y más tipos de quesos, ya que este es un negocio muy bueno y estable, el cual le brindar muy buenas ganancias, por lo que desea hacerlo crecer más. De esta manera María desea poder superarse como comerciante y así mismo brindarle una vida mejor a su hijo en la cual posee todo lo necesario para tener una vida digna.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old. She lives together with her daughter and a young granddaughter. She earns her living by selling dairy products like cream, cheese, and "requesón" [a creamier Latin American version of ricotta]. Her stall is located in the municipal market in her town, and she has several weekly buyers of her products. 

María is requesting a loan with which she will be able to buy more dairy products like requesón, cream, and more types of cheese, since her business is very good and stable. This will provide her with very good earnings, which is why she wants to grow her business more. 

María wishes to improve herself as a businesswoman and thereby provide her daughter with a better life in which she has everything she needs to have a respectable life.

loans.use: to purchase dairy products to sell.

loans.name: Jose Ovidio

texts.es: José de 38 años de edad, es una persona responsable y previsora quien le gusta trabajar para contar con todo lo necesario. Él es una persona muy humilde que vive junto a sus padres, José se dedica a la carpintería, poseyendo un negocio en el que se dedica a la elaboración de muebles, roperos, estantes, sillas, y todo lo que sus clientes le pidan y se pueda realizar con madera. José tiene mucha experiencia ya que cuenta con 13 años de trabajar de esta manera, siendo muy conocido por muchas personas y también es muy recomendado ya que realiza trabajos muy finos. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de madera, para que no le haga falta y de este modo aceptar los trabajos que le pidan, con lo que pueda mejorar en gran manera sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Jose is 38 years old and is a responsible visionary person who likes to work to have what he needs.  He is a humble person who lives with his parents and works as a carpenter, having a business where he makes furniture, clothing cabinets, shelves, chairs, and whatever his customers request that can be made of wood.

Jose has 12 years’ experience and is well known by many people.  He also comes highly recommended because he does fine work.  Jose is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so that he can buy quantities of lumber so that he will not be short and can accept more jobs.  This will help him increase his income.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Blanca Marvin

texts.es: Blanca de 35 años de edad, es una madre de familia muy responsable quien se dedica de lleno a su trabajo para brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo con los gastos familiares.  Blanca se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, las cuales comercializa de lunes a domingo tanto al mediodía como por las tardes,  ella debe trabajar muy duro  ya que ella cuenta con varios clientes, los cuales se saturan, sobre todo en las horas pico. Este ha sido un negocio de mucha ayuda tanto para Blanca como para toda su familia, por lo que solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de maíz, leña, cal y una refrigeradora lo cual será de mucha ayuda para ella. La elaboración de tortillas es un trabajo muy duro pero Blanca lo realiza con actitud positiva ya que sabe que de esta manera les dará todo lo necesario a sus tres hijos.
texts.en: Blanca is 35 years old and a very responsible mother who gives her all to her work so that she can help her husband with the family expenses.  Blanca makes and sells tortillas in the afternoons and evenings,   seven days a week.  She must work hard because she has some steady customers who saturate her, especially at peak times.  This business has been a great help to Blanca and the rest of the family.  She is asking for this loan so that she can buy corn in quantity, firewood, salt, and a refrigerator which will be a great help to her.  Making tortillas is hard work, but Blanca does it with a positive attitude and knows that this way she will be able to provide her children with all they need.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: José es un comerciante muy entrepido y trabajador quien se dedica a la venta de productos como controles remotos para televisores, café molido, accesorios para relojes, entre otros más, el los comercializa de forma ambulante por colonias y pueblos, dando a conocer sus productos de casa en casa. José vive junto a su esposa y cuatro hijos menores de edad, quienes se dedican a estudiar, principal razón por la que se esfuerza mucho más y no permitir que le haga falta nada a sus hijos. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda surtir su negocio comprando más controles remotos de diferentes marcas, también para comprar más accesorios de relojes, con lo que él espera mejorar significativamente sus ventas.
texts.en: Jose is a very intrepid and hardworking merchant who sells things like TV remotes, ground coffee, watch accessories, and other things.  He sells on foot within neighborhoods and towns, showing his products from door to door.  Jose lives with his wife and four children, who attend school.  They are the main reason he works so hard so that they are not in need of anything.  Jose is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so that he can stock his business with more remote controls of different brands, and also watch accessories.  He expects to improve his sales significantly.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 39 años de edad, es una madre responsable de dos hijos menores de edad, y junto a su esposo quien se dedica a trabajar. Ángela se dedica a la venta de perfumes y ropa para hombres y mujeres, cremas, cosméticos, champo y otros artículos más,  los cuales  comercializa en su hogar y así mismo de manera ambulante por distintas colonias y casas de familiares y amigos.  Ángela solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar más perfumería y mayor cantidad de cremas para el cabello y el cuerpo. El mayor deseo de Ángela es poder aumentar sus ventas y de esta manera brindarle más ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, ya que los ingresos obtenidos por el  trabajo de su compañero de vida no dan abasto en muchas ocasiones  para cubrir  todas las necesidades del hogar, es por ello que Ángela se esfuerza con el deseo de poder obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Angela is 39 years old and is a responsible mother with two young children.  Her husband works.  Angela sells perfumes and men’s and women’s clothing, creams, cosmetics, shampoo and other things.  She sells from her home and also on foot within neighborhoods and her friends’ and family’s homes.  She is asking for this loan to buy more perfumes and body and hair creams in quantity.  Angela’s greatest desire is to increase her sales and provide more help to her husband for the household expenses, since his salary is not enough to cover all the costs.  This is why Angela works hard for more income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Veronica Lisseth

texts.es: Verónica de 26 años de edad, es una joven madre de dos pequeños de 3 años y otro de seis meses de vida, ella es madre soltera y se esfuerza mucho para poder vivir establemente. Verónica trabaja como costurera, ella se encarga de confeccionar ropa formal, uniformes y ropa casual, ella es alguien muy detallista quien desarrolla un trabajo muy bueno, lo que le permite contar con la fidelidad de muchos clientes amigos y vecinos. Verónica elabora trabajos por encargo y así mismo elabora prendas de vestir para vender en su casa de habitación, donde también se dedica a elaborar su trabajo con lo que puede obtener ganancias extras. Verónica  solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder comprar telas en diferentes colores y estampados, así mismo comprar hilo, agujas y todo lo necesario para elaborar la ropa con lo que pueda realizar más trabajos.
texts.en: Twenty-six-year-old Verónica is a young mother of two little ones, a three-year-old and a six-month-old.  She is a single mother and she works very hard to have stability in her life.  Verónica works as a seamstress; she makes formal clothing, uniforms, and casual clothing.  She is a very detail-oriented person who does very good work, which has allowed her to count on the loyalty of many customers, friends, and neighbors.  Verónica does work to order and she also makes garments on her own to sell in her home.  Her home is also where she does her work, which allows her to earn extra.  Verónica is asking for a loan to buy fabrics in different colors and patterns, as well as to buy thread, needles, and all the things she needs to make clothing so she can do more work.

loans.use: to buy fabrics to make clothing

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 65 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora y dedicada al bien de su familia ella vive junto a dos hijos y su esposo. Teresa trabaja elaborando minutas las cuales son hechas de hielo granizado y bañado con jarabes de diferentes sabores, estos postres tienen mucha demanda debido a clima cálido este país y así mismo al buen sabor y bajo costo. Ella comercializa las minutas de forma ambulante, por distintos parques y lugares de turismo como playas, iglesias y mercados. Teresa solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar un carretón nuevo donde coloca el hielo, así mismo para comprar frutas, miel, jarabes de sabores, vasos y cucharas para colocar las minutas. Lo que Teresa más desea es poder aumentar sus ventas significativamente y de esta forma poder tener una vida más estable junto a su familia.
texts.en: Teresa is 65 years old and is a hardworking woman dedicated to her family’s wellbeing. She lives with her two children and her husband.  She makes snow cones from shaved ice covered with syrup of different flavors.  These desserts are in great demand because of the hot weather in this country and they taste good and are low cost.  She sells the snow cones on foot in different parks and tourist areas like beaches, churches, and markets.  Teresa is asking for this loan from INTEGRAL to a new cart, and also fruits, syrup, flavored syrups, cups, spoons.  Teresa really wants to be able to increase her sales significantly to be able to give her family a more stable life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en: Lucia is a hard working mother who buys and sells vegetables in the local community. She is 44 years old, married and has two school-age children. Due to the hardships of living, Lucia aims to improve her business and generate sufficient income to finance the education of her children and satisfy their daily needs. To improve the business, she wants to buy more vegetables to sell but since she has inadequate capital, she is asking for 10,000 PHP to buy additional stock of tomatoes, carrots, cabbages, onions, eggplants and beans. Through this loan, she believes that she will improve the business and improve their status of living as she continues to work hard and strive for it.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of tomatoes, carrots, cabbages, onions, eggplants and beans to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients to make pupusas for sale.

loans.name: Magda Estela

texts.es: Magda de 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en casa de su padre, ella posee un negocio propio en cual fue heredado por su padre y que es de mucha ayuda para su economía.  Ella tiene una tienda de productos de primera necesidad como comestibles y productos de uso diario en el hogar, muchos productos poseen una gran demanda por parte de las personas, las cuales Magda desea mucho poder aumentar, ya que le permitirán tener mayores ganancias lo cual es muy importante para ella, ya que es gracias a la tienda que tanto ella como se esposo poseen una vida estable. Magda solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la tienda comprando productos como leche en polvo, pan, golosinas y sodas, entre otro número de productos más. Magda posee una gran ilusión de poder ver su negocio en mejores condiciones y brindándoles el dinero necesario para salir adelante.
texts.en: Magda is 44 years old and lives with her husband in her father’s home.  She has a business that she inherited from her father and it has been great financial help.  She has a store where she sells consumables and daily use products for the home.  Many of the products are in high demand and Magda wants to increase her inventory because they provide good profits which is important to her and helps her and her husband have a stable life.  Magda is asking for this loan in order to buy products such as powdered milk, bread, snacks, and sodas among other things.  Magda has a great hope to be able to see her business in a better state and have the money she needs to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy products.

loans.name: Efren

texts.en:
Efren is a farmer living at Solana with his wife and children.  He plants and harvests rice to sell to traders and has been in business for over 10 years.  

He usually earns about P20,000 twice a year, during harvest season.  He used the money to pay school expenses and to meet his family's daily needs. Efren also saves some income to plant his next crop.  Efren really works hard on his farmland and this ensures a healthy harvest in order to gain more profits. 

Efren wanted to keep increasing his yield and that is why he is seeking to borrow additional capital in the amount of P40,000.  He will buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides.  It will help nourish his crops. 

With a good harvest, Efren will attain income stability and achieve business progression in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Robin

texts.en:
Robin is a farmer living with his children and spouse at Solana.  He plant and harvest rice to sell to traders at their village.  He's been in business for over 10 years.  

He used his profits to pay for meals and education expenses.  He usually earns about P20,000 each harvest season (twice a year).  Robin aims to increase his income and that is why he is asking for a loan of P45,000 to buy rice seeds to grow, fertilizers and insecticides.  This will help ensure healthy growth and nutrition of his crops. 

Robin would like to keep producing abundant harvests that will lead to the improvement of his family's living conditions.  He wants to become a successful entrepreneur someday.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds to grow, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Maria Edith

texts.es: María Edith de cincuenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, carnes, pollo entre otros, toda su mercadería es de primera calidad y la vende a precios accesibles, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside, tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que le permite estar adelante de la competencia, además de su excelente servicio; María es una mujer que ama su labor, trabaja desde muy temprano para al final del día poder compartir con lo mas importante para ella su familia, es emprendedora, enérgica y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere alcanzar el éxito y no descansara hasta lograrlo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda de su producto y necesita aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras, pollo, carne etc. María Edith tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
María Edith is 58 years old, and lives with her life companion and her two children in their own house.

She sells vegetables, meat, chicken and other items. All of her merchandise is top quality, and she sells it at affordable prices. She is very well known in the area where she lives, has a great deal of experience selling, and has acquired a large clientele. This, in addition to her excellent service, allows her to stay ahead of the competition.

María is a woman who loves what she does, and works from an early hour until the end of the day, to be able to share her earnings with her family; as for her they are the most important thing. She is an enterprising, energetic woman, and has a great desire to succeed. She wants to achieve success and will not rest until she does. In recent weeks, demand for products has increased and she needs to increase her investment. 

That is why she's applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy vegetables, chicken, meat, etc. María Edith has good payment references from people who know her. She says she will be able to pay off the debt within the timeframe established, and at the same time has faith that she will be able to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Majidan

texts.en: Ms. Majidan is a 29-year-old widow. She is the mother of two children. Her husband died three years ago, and she was in miserable condition just after his death. She is trying hard to fulfill the needs of her children. In order to support her family members, she is running a business manufacturing carpets. She offers various handmade carpets in different colors. She has become famous for providing good quality carpets in her community. She is contentedly doing it for the sake of her family. She is also sewing as a part-time job. In this way, she is able to handle her family's needs and requirements effectively. She has applied for a loan of PKR 20,000 from the Kashf Foundation to buy good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibres to increase her sales. She wishes to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibres to increase her sales.

loans.name: Apolo

texts.en:
Apolo is 32 years old, married and blessed with one child.  His wife is an overseas Filipino worker at Brunei, while he is busy running his two hectares of rice field.

It's been seven years since he start cultivating his farm land.  According to him, gained profits from his rice field was used to cover up all their daily household expenses and to buy his hand tractor machinery. 

Apolo's main goal is to improve his rice crop production so he can improve his family's standard of living and to educate his child.  for his family.  To make all this things possible, Apolo is seeking a loan of PHP35,000.  He will use this amount to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, insecticides and to hire laborers to transplant his farm land. 

He hopes that his requested loan amount will be granted.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, insecticides and to hire laborers to transplant his farm land.

loans.name: Gamman

texts.en: Ms. Gamman 47 years old and the mother of three children. For 25 years, Gamman has been running a business selling milk. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread-earner. With time, her sales increased and so did her income. Now she has two buffaloes and two cows. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got from sending her two sons to school for education. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy another buffalo. She is in her second loan cycle with the Kashf Foundation. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to buy another buffalo.

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.en:
Aurelio is living with his wife and one child at the village of San Jose.  He has owned and operated a one and a half hectare rice field for the past five years.  

He is really glad that he is able to make his rice field productive.  Now, he would like to maintain continuous growth so he can earn better yields and profits, which will be used to cover all of his family's household expenses.

Aurelio is asking for additional capital of PHP30,000 to buy necessary farm inputs such as fertilizer and insecticides.  This will help him gain better yields, every harvest season and enables him to earn greater profits.

loans.use: to buy necessary farm inputs such as fertilizer and insecticides.

loans.name: Shahzadi

texts.en:
Ms. Shahzadi is a 23-year-old woman who has been running a business of hand embroidery for many years. She has become famous in her town for providing exclusive designs for weddings and parties. She initiated her own business to support her family when her father was the only bread-earner. She makes enough to contribute in the family income. Because of her work, she is respected in her home.

In order to complete orders on time, she needs to buy raw materials, so she contacted the Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 20,000. She will use this loan to buy spools of threads and packs of sequins, pearls, and glitter for embellishment. This will help her complete more orders on time, which ultimately helps in bring in more cash. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread and packs of sequins, pearls, and glitter for embellishment.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es: Natividad de sesenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos y nietos en casa propia, el posee una venta de productos de aluminio y plástico como ollas, guacales, comales entre otros , tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en un lugar estratégico que califico como muy bueno para sus actividades comerciales,  es muy conocido, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además  del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Natividad es un hombre enérgico, trabajador, y con muchas metas por delante, esta dispuesto a esforzarse al máximo pues sabe que solo así podrá cumplir sus sueños y llegar al éxito, como todo buen comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar nuevas inversiones pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar producto plástico y de aluminio etc. Natividad tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Natividad is 67 years old and lives with his life partner, his children, and grandchildren in his own home.  He sells aluminum and plastic products such as pots, bowls, and griddles, among other things.  He has been doing this for several years and has gained lots of sales experience which allows him to earn a good income.  His business in located in a strategic location, known to be very good for business.  He is very well known and has many customers who prefer to buy from him because he sells quality products at good prices, and provides excellent service, always meeting his customers’ needs.

Natividad is an energetic, hardworking man with many goals ahead.  He is prepared to work hard and to the maximum extent because he knows that this is the only way to achieve his dream and succeed.
